name: Autumn perfection dress up game
description:
Free, HUGE dress up game. Create a chic street look for fall! Comfy and casual.

It's a beautiful fall day in the city! Maybe she lives there, or visiting her friend. It's fall season, time to dress up warm clothes and during hot coffee. Sevelina adore autumn colors.
You will definitely love to play this dress up game with huge amount of autumn clothes and accessories.
Warm sweaters, cozy shawls, knitted jackets, cool pants, and everything else you need to create a chic look for autumn! It's always appropriate to wear autumn colors, not just during the fall season. Comfortable and casual, always in style!
